elements.label: Mending the Character of my Soul
elements.description: The movements of the great actors in Myth and Wake can inspire and guide me. I must find such an inspiration, and it will show me what to do.

slots.label: A Location
slots.description: I must find a place that still echoes with a momentous decision, made long ago.

slots.label: A Story
slots.description: Great decisions must have been recorded, either in proze or poetry, I must find such a tale.
